meanings.definition: A learned scholar or teacher, especially in Hinduism.
meanings.sent1: The pandits at the temple taught the children about ancient scriptures.
meanings.sent2: The pandits gathered to discuss the philosophical teachings of the Vedas.
meanings.sent3: The pandits had a friendly debate about the meaning of a sacred text.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom shone brightly, like a pandit guiding lost souls.
meanings.sent5: The pandits' knowledge illuminated the minds of all who listened.

meanings.definition: A person with deep knowledge or expertise in a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The financial pandits predicted the stock market crash.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the pandit of gardening in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The pandits shared their expertise on baking the perfect cake.
meanings.sent4: His advice was like that of a pandit in matters of the heart.
meanings.sent5: The pandits' insights transformed the way we viewed the world.
